name: [Magical Girl Dreams] [Emotions Dreams]
description:
A musical rythm game about a girl exploring the star map of her dreams.
She is learning how to live her emotions, and discovering that going through this is what makes her a real Magical Girl.
Keep doing your best everyone ~ you deserve it !

This is a prototype demo which include the main gameplay.
On my spare time I will try to explore my abilities to keep it growing.

Hope you will like this little piece ~
